name: Elevator Invaders
description:
Play as an astronaut trying to get back to earth in a space elevator under attack. Grapple asteroids, crash through aliens, and try to make it home in time for your daughter's rock concert!

Elevator Invaders is a jam game by slimefriend made in 4 days while learning the Godot game engine.

CONTROLS

Aim with left mouse button / left joystick

Fire grapple / jump off rocks with LMB / Space / A

NB:

The web version will lose your best score when you refresh the page -- use the exe if u wanna build up a good high score!
